original_text: Therefore they sacrifice unto their net, and burn incense unto their drag; because by them their portion is fat, and their meat plenteous.
korean_text: 그물에 제사하며 투망 앞에 분향하오니 이는 그것을 힘입어 소득이 풍부하고 먹을 것이 풍성하게 됨이니이다

sentences.original_text: Therefore they sacrifice unto their net
and burn incense unto their drag
because by them their portion is fat
